messages.title: A prescription for a stronger NHS
messages.content: With a majority government that can get Brexit done, we can take back control of our borders. That means we can introduce an Australian-style points-based immigration system. Taking pressure off our public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A new NHS visa for the world's best doctors and nurses. 50 million extra GP surgery appointments. 6,000 more doctors. £33.9 billion extra in funding.
Plan to build 40 new hospitals and upgrade 20 existing ones.
Measures to prevent health tourism and ensure the NHS is for UK residents.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: 300 new MRI machines, CT scanners and breast-screening machines
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investment in 300 new MRI machines, CT scanners, and breast-screening machines.
Plans to recruit 50,000 more nurses for the NHS.

mentions.candidate: Let’s get Brexit done – so we can focus on the country’s priorities. Like giving our NHS the same care and attention that NHS staff give to us.

issues.brexitEurope: With a majority government that can get Brexit done, we can take back control of our borders.
issues.health: A prescription for a stronger NHS
issues.immigration: Introduce an Australian-style points-based immigration system. Taking pressure off our public services.

images.caption: Campaign leaflet images showing keywords and policies related to the NHS.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet content strongly focuses on NHS-related policies and Brexit.
